sexualities.name: Gay
sexualities.definition: Sexually or romantically attracted exclusively to people of one's own sex or gender (used especially of a man)

sexualities.name: Lesbian
sexualities.definition: Sexually or romantically attracted exclusively to people of one's own sex or gender (used especially of a woman)

sexualities.name: Bisexual
sexualities.definition: Sexually or romantically attracted to multiple genders with gender preferences (someone who identifies as bisexual may be attracted to men and women but not non-binary people).

sexualities.name: Pansexual
sexualities.definition: Sexually or romantically attracted to all genders without any specific preference.

sexualities.name: Asexual
sexualities.definition: Experiencing no sexual feelings or desires; not feeling sexual attraction to anyone.

sexualities.name: Abrosexual
sexualities.definition: Experiencing fluidity of sexuality (someone who is abrosexual may be attracted to men for a period of time and men another).

sexualities.name: Omnisexual
sexualities.definition: Involving or characterized by diverse forms of sexuality; attracted to more than one gender.
